scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run typings && npm run build-for-browser && npm run build-for-nodejs
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run test-nodejs && npm run test-browser
scripts.test-chrome: webpack --config webpack.for.browser.tests.config.js && karma start karma.browser.conf.js --single-run --browsers Chrome
scripts.test-require: npm run build && npm install -g . && npm ls -g && cd test && node test-require.js && cd .. && npm remove -g .
scripts.publish-patch: npm run build && npm version patch && npm publish
scripts.publish-minor: npm run build && npm version minor && npm publish
